data.eml:eml: Two new tardigrade species from Sicily

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pilato, Giovanni, Sabella, Giorgio, Lisi, Oscar (2014): Two new tardigrade species from Sicily. Zootaxa 3754 (2): 173-184, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3754.2.6
